coldproof: Coldproof to sub-freezing temperatures of minus 10 degrees C (14 degrees F), ideal for snowy days.
specialeffects: Black & White, Brightness, Color, Color Extract, Fisheye, High contrast, Ink Rubbing, Miniature, Retro, Sepia, Soft, Starburst, Toy camera
facedetection: Capture perfect portraits with fast Face Detection technology, Smile Capture, and Blink Detection.
crushproof: Crushproof construction withstands weights up to 220 LBF (pound-force).
dustproof: Dustproof design protects the camera from dry, dusty environments.
hdmiport: An HDMI port plays back beautiful, high definition images and video on HDTVs.
waterproof: Waterproof to 33 feet, perfect for the pool, beach, waterpark or any other extreme adventure.
shockproof: Shockproof, ruggedized design protects from drops up to 5 feet.
supportedflashmemory: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
shootingprograms: Candle, Digital IS, Digital microscope, Digital panorama, Digital wide, Fireworks, Flower, Food, Frame composition, Green, Kids, Landscape, Night scene, Night scene with portrait, Pet, Portrait mode, Report, Sports mode, Surf & snow, Text, Underwater
